description: This PHP script handles AJAX requests related to initial setup on a router device. It manages session validation, router name configuration, DHCP enable/disable, IP address validation, and setting network parameters including DHCP pool and DMZ configurations.

methods.name: isValidIP
methods.description: Checks if a given IP address falls within a specified range.

methods.name: ipRange
methods.description: Calculates the start and end IP addresses of the subnet range based on gateway address and subnet mask.

methods.name: valid_GW_IP
methods.description: Validates if the gateway IP is within a specific address range.

methods.name: isValidGW
methods.description: Validates if the gateway address is within private IP ranges and if it falls within the specified IP range.
